**Code snippet**
```go
package main

import (
	"context"
	"github.com/m1keru/go-atlassian/jira"
	"log"
	"os"
)

func main() {

	var (
		host  = os.Getenv("HOST")
		mail  = os.Getenv("MAIL")
		token = os.Getenv("TOKEN")
	)

	jiraCloud, err := jira.New(nil, host)
	if err != nil {
		return
	}

	jiraCloud.Auth.SetBasicAuth(mail, token)
	jiraCloud.Auth.SetUserAgent("curl/7.54.0")

	// Steps to reproduce

}
```
